EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 2 - Nokia Blog
EmailTemplate.subject: Three key questions to ask before moving your SBCs to the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A new Nokia blog. Find simple answers to cloudifying your Session Border Controller. View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud Three questions to ask before moving your Session Border Controllers to the cloud
In our blog post, learn how signaling and media planes, media quality and the MANO framework are impacted when virtualizing and cloudifying your SBCs. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
